name: Cream dory Bellpepper Basil
description: Indulge in a healthy and flavorful journey with our Cream dory Bellpepper Basil recipe. Perfect for those following a high-protein, low-carb diet without compromising on taste. This dish is crafted with succulent Pangasius fillet, enriched with the aromatic presence of fresh basil leaves, and complemented with a sharp cheddar cheese topping, making it a hearty yet healthy choice.

recipeInstructions.text: Crack the eggs into a bowl and beat them lightly.
recipeInstructions.name: Step 2

recipeInstructions.text: Grate the sharp cheddar cheese and set aside.
recipeInstructions.name: Step 3

recipeInstructions.text: Rinse the Pangasius fillet under cold water and pat dry with paper towels.
recipeInstructions.name: Step 4

recipeInstructions.text: Chop the fresh basil leaves finely.
recipeInstructions.name: Step 5

recipeInstructions.text: In a mixing bowl, combine the beaten eggs, grated cheese, and chopped basil. Mix well.
recipeInstructions.name: Step 6

recipeInstructions.text: Lay the Pangasius fillets in a baking dish and cover them with the egg-cheese-basil mixture.
recipeInstructions.name: Step 7

recipeInstructions.text: Bake in the preheated oven for 20 minutes or until the fillets are cooked through and the topping is golden brown.
recipeInstructions.name: Step 8
